snippet: The bands Poor Rich Boy and DakhaBrakha performed at the Global Beat Festival on Monday night.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances by Ukrainian band DakhaBrakha and Pakistani band Poor Rich Boy at Brookfield Place's Winter Garden as part of the Global Beat Festival.
lead_paragraph: The bands Poor Rich Boy and DakhaBrakha performed at the Global Beat Festival on Monday night.

headline.seo: DakhaBrakha Plays at the Global Beat Festival
headline.main: Put Language Aside, Then Let the Music Take Time to Speak
headline.print_headline: Put Language Aside, Then Let the Music Take Time to Speak
